description: Responsible for analyzing AI responding to coding problems. Verify responses on different custom made parameters including safety, usefulness, and correctness

Operated and maintained Cologuard testing equipment to process 300-400 patient samples a day under strict regulation. Troubleshot processes with lab product developers to continuously decrease the error rate of one of our automated machines by > 90%.

Collaborated with multiple teams of software developers and clients to develop community-level reports on topics ranging from diabetes to Medicaid usage for over eight hospital systems; personally developed internal tools in VBA to automatically project customer database sizes, reducing projection-creation time by 20%; worked on the internal sizing team to independently project hardware needs for more than 100 customers; and led the internal VMware pod, ensuring application-specific VM architecture requirements were met.
